initializeTables.initializeTable: CREATE TABLE chronicle ( id INT NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) CONSTRAINT chron_pk PRIMARY KEY, parentId INT DEFAULT 0, tag VARCHAR(50) DEFAULT NULL, description VARCHAR(400) DEFAULT NULL, inserted TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )

CREATE TABLE comment (id INT NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1) CONSTRAINT comment_pk PRIMARY KEY, chronicleId INT, description VARCHAR(400) DEFAULT NULL, inserted TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CONSTRAINT chronicleId_fk FOREIGN KEY (chronicleId) REFERENCES chronicle (id))
